7.ara-name: كتاب الزكاة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Fatimah bint Qais narrated that :she asked -or, the Prophet was asked - about Zakat, and he said: "Indeed there is a duty on wealthy aside from Zakat." Then he recited this Ayah which is in Al-Baqarah: 'It is not Al-Birr (piety, righteousness) that you turn your faces.' (Al-Baqarah 2:)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ فِي الْمَالِ حَقًّا سِوَى الزَّكَاةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: There Is A Duty On Wealthy Aside From Zakat
